lines: Innovation is to imagine the future and fill in the gaps.
author: <Author:0x00007fa212d3c910>

lines: Without forgiveness, there is no future.
author: <Author:0x00007fa212d25a80>

lines: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
author: <Author:0x00007fa212cfca68>

lines: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
author: <Author:0x00007fa212d667d8>

lines: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
author: <Author:0x00007fa212d54600>

lines: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
author: <Author:0x00007fa212d8ca50>

lines: I cannot do all the good that the world needs. But the world needs all the good that I can do.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb5e3f628>

lines: Caring about the happiness of others, we find our own.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb5856478>

lines: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6143540>

lines: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb5fd8ca0>

lines: The capacity to care is the thing which gives life its deepest significance.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb5e9e128>

lines: Above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you, because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6311700>

lines: Be curious, not judgmental.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb619c820>

lines: Curiosity is more important than knowledge.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6779c98>

lines: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift would be curiosity.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb65697a0>

lines: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb696e260>

lines: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6924340>

lines: You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6a1d0d0>

lines: Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb69dcb20>

lines: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6a99a40>

lines: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6a6c950>

lines: First, I prepare. Then I have faith.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6a3e8e8>

lines: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6ae6e08>

lines: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6aba498>

lines: It’s better to look ahead and prepare, than to look back and regret.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6b52130>

lines: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6b2a090>

lines: Never, never, never give up.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6bbb040>

lines: If you have made mistakes, even serious ones, there is always another chance for you.  What we call failure is not the falling down, but the staying down.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6b90e58>

lines: Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it or work around it.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6c21638>

lines: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6bfa0b0>

lines: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6bcf3b0>

lines: Have patience with all things, but, first of all with yourself.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb64a7bc8>

lines: Patience is not simply the ability to wait—it's how we behave while we're waiting.
author: <Author:0x0000560fb6a8a748>
